name: youtube-analyzer-mcp
description: Analyzes video ideas and returns high-performing titles/thumbnails from YouTube
long_description: YouTube Analyzer MCP helps content creators find proven, successful title and thumbnail combinations from recent high-performing videos. It searches for related videos using the YouTube Data API v3, applies semantic search for broader relevance, filters results to videos from the last 30 days with high view counts, and manages API quota efficiently. The server provides comprehensive analysis tools including performance metrics tracking, title optimization suggestions, and thumbnail recommendations.

tools.name: analyze_video_idea
tools.description: Analyze a video idea and find high-performing related videos with titles and thumbnails

tools.name: get_quota_status
tools.description: Check current YouTube API quota usage

tools.name: expand_search_terms
tools.description: Generate semantic variations of a video idea for broader search

tools.name: get_performance_metrics
tools.description: Get detailed performance metrics and analytics

prompts.name: analyze_video_performance
prompts.description: Analyze video performance metrics and provide insights
prompts.text: Analyze the performance metrics for videos related to '${arguments.videoIdea}'. Look at view counts, engagement rates, publish times, and other factors that contribute to their success. Provide actionable insights for content creators.

prompts.name: optimize_title
prompts.description: Get title optimization suggestions based on high-performing videos
prompts.text: Based on high-performing YouTube videos about '${arguments.videoIdea}', suggest optimized video titles. Analyze patterns in successful titles including length, keywords, emotional triggers, and formatting. Provide 5-10 title suggestions.

prompts.name: thumbnail_suggestions
prompts.description: Get thumbnail design suggestions based on successful patterns
prompts.text: Analyze thumbnail patterns from high-performing videos about '${arguments.videoIdea}'. Describe common elements like text overlay styles, color schemes, facial expressions, and composition. Provide specific thumbnail design recommendations.

youtube_api_key.title: YouTube API Key
youtube_api_key.description: Your YouTube Data API v3 key (has default for personal use)

min_view_count.title: Minimum View Count
min_view_count.description: Minimum view count for videos to consider (default: 10000)

max_results.title: Maximum Results
max_results.description: Maximum number of results to return (default: 10)

cache_ttl.title: Cache TTL (minutes)
cache_ttl.description: How long to cache search results (default: 15)
